verse:
सा मुञ्चमुञ्चालमिति प्रभाषिणी निष्पीड्यमानाखिलजीवमर्मणि ।
विवृत्य नेत्रे चरणौ भुजौ मुहुः प्रस्विन्नगात्रा क्षिपती रुरोद ह ॥
meaning: पूतना चिला रही छोड़ दे अरे छोड़ दे मर जाऊंगी, ठाकुर जी ने कहा देख पिछले जन्म में राजा बली की लड़की थी रत्नमाला जब मैं वामन बन कर गया था तो तू ने मन में सोचा था अरे अगर ये मेरा बेटा होता इतना सुंदर और दूध पीता मेरा तो कितना सुख मिलता है तो मैंने वरदान दिया था इशारे में ठीक है ठीक है आ जाना कृष्णावतार में इसलिए मैं छोडूंगा नहीं तुझको अपने लोक ले जाऊंगा

terms.akhila-jīva-marmaṇi: in every center of her vitality

vedabase.translation: Unbearably pressed in every vital point, the demon Pūtanā began to cry, “Please leave me, leave me! Suck my breast no longer!” Perspiring, her eyes wide open and her arms and legs flailing, she cried very loudly again and again.
vedabase.purport: The Rākṣasī was severely punished by Kṛṣṇa. She threw her arms and legs about, and Kṛṣṇa also began to kick her with His legs to punish her properly for her mischievous activities.

terms.खिलजीवमर्मणि (khilajīvamarmaṇi): in all the vital points of the living beings

gpt.meaning: She said, "Leave, leave! Stop speaking!" while being troubled in all the vital points of the living beings. Repeatedly opening the eyes, feet, and arms, and with sweat drenched bodies, she threw herself around and cried, "Alas!"

bard.meaning: she was speaking, "release me enough" being tormented in all the body parts, often opens eyes, feet, arms, with trembling body throws and cries alas
